info.description: API to retrieve the US customer details
info.title: US model bank  customer management

get.summary: Retrieves the US customer details such as document reference, status, validity, issuer details, and version information details

custDocument.description: Stores details of   non-contract specific documents tracked for customers. Such documents could be Customer level documents tracked for CUSTOMER record input or Non-Contract specific documents tracked for record input in any application other than CUSTOMER.

referenceNumber.description: Specifies the reference for the document, if any.

startDate.description: Contains the date on which the transaction or payment gets initiated.

claimStatus.description: Status update of the claim records

statusDate.description: Specifies the Date from which the status applies to the document.

stateId.description: Represents the US State to which the address belongs to.

countryName.description: This is the country name that the financial institution resides in.

issuedBy.description: The issuer of a security or a bond.

issueDate.description: The date the item was issued.

expiryDate.description: The date an agreement such as an arrangement, product, credit facility or limit is due to expire

documentSequence.description: Specifies the sequence number of a document, to distinguish a new document obtained on expiry of the original one.

receivedDate.description: Identifies the date on which the document was received

additionalInformation.description: Additional Information provided to add context
Additional Information provided to add context

imageReference.description: Indicates the reference no. E.g. contract no./customer no./payments no. to which the image/document is attached to

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
